mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Petit-Radel, M., 1756-1836
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His father, a business man in Lyon, France, was in government and political affairs in Cambris; obliged to quit the country; leave his chattels; has had property confiscated; been reduced from a respectable to a distressing situation; asks Jefferson to accord the sympathy which all friends give.
